item.title: 波动性阻碍了期权市场对盈利推动美股波动的押注
item.description: 一种押注个股在公司业绩公布后出现超预期走势的期权策略在本财报季大获全胜，但本周的波动率飙升却让这一策略偏离了正常轨道。【原文：An options strategy that bets on individual stocks logging larger-than-expected moves after corporate results was winning big this earnings season but is among many that has been derailed by this week’s volatility spike.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称印度信实公司与委内瑞拉达成原油换石脑油交易
item.description: 三位了解合同条款的消息人士称，印度信实工业公司（Reliance Industries）在上个月获得美国批准恢复与委内瑞拉的石油贸易后，计划用供应的石脑油作为从委内瑞拉购买原油的部分付款。【原文：India's Reliance Industries plans to use naptha supplies as partial payment for crude purchases from Venezuela after the refiner obtained a U.S. approval last month to resume oil trade with the sanctioned producer, three sources aware of the contract terms said.】

item.title: 薪酬专家称，华尔街投行奖金最高可能上涨 35
item.description: 华尔街薪酬分析公司 Johnson Associates 在一份报告中称，从事债务承销的投资银行家今年的奖金可能会增加 25% 至 35%，而负责首次公开募股的银行家 2024 年的奖金可能会增加 20% 至 30%。【原文：Investment bankers working on debt underwriting may see bonuses climb by 25% to 35% this year, and bankers handling initial public offerings could see a 20% to 30% jump in 2024, Johnson Associates, a Wall Street compensation analysis firm said in a report.】

item.title: 瑞安航空增加股票回购计划，原因是交付延迟增加了现金流
item.description: 瑞安航空（Ryanair）周四表示，由于现金状况强于预期，部分原因是新波音飞机的延迟交付，公司将在未来六到九个月内回购多达 8 亿欧元（8.7248 亿美元）的股票。【原文：Ryanair said on Thursday it would buy back up to 800 million euros ($872.48 million) more of its shares over the next six to nine months due to a stronger than expected cash position, driven partly by the delayed delivery of new Boeing aircraft.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，网络安全公司趋势科技正在探索出售事宜
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士周四表示，市值约 9500 亿日元（65 亿美元）的日本网络安全公司趋势科技（Trend Micro）在吸引了收购兴趣后，正在探索出售事宜。【原文：Trend Micro , a Japanese cybersecurity firm with a market value of about 950 billion yen ($6.5 billion), is exploring a sale after attracting buyout interest, people familiar with the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 通用汽车表示，尽管面临挑战，但仍将致力于在华运营
item.description: 通用汽车公司周四表示，尽管面临来自本土品牌的激烈竞争，该公司仍将致力于在中国建立一个盈利且可自我维持的业务。【原文：General Motors said on Thursday it was committed to building a profitable and self-sustainable operation in China, despite facing stiff competition from local brands.】

item.title: 美国商品期货交易委员会称，加密货币交易所 FTX 被勒令向客户支付 127 亿美元
item.description: 美国商品期货交易委员会周四表示，美国法院已下令破产的加密货币交易所 FTX 向其客户支付 127 亿美元救济金。【原文：A U.S. court has ordered bankrupt cryptocurrency exchange FTX to pay $12.7 billion in relief to its customers, the Commodity Futures Trading Commission said on Thursday.】

item.title: 苹果公司在欧盟委员会调查后修改欧盟应用商店政策
item.description: 苹果公司周四改变了其在欧盟的政策，允许开发人员在应用程序之外与客户交流，此前欧盟委员会于 6 月份指控这家 iPhone 制造商违反了欧盟的技术规则。【原文：Apple on Thursday changed its policy in the European Union to allow developers to communicate with their customers outside the app after the Commission charged the iPhone maker in June for breaching the bloc's tech rules.】

item.title: 独家报道嘉吉公司内部备忘录描述了为精简公司而进行的结构性改革
item.description: 据路透社和两位公司消息人士看到的一份公司内部文件显示，全球贸易公司嘉吉（Cargill）在未能实现内部盈利目标后将进行结构调整，计划将业务部门从五个精简为三个。【原文：Global trading house Cargill will undergo structural changes after missing internal earnings goals, with plans to streamline operations into three units instead of five, according to an internal company document seen by Reuters and two company sources.】

item.title: X 同意不使用部分欧盟用户数据来训练人工智能聊天机器人
item.description: 爱尔兰一家法院周四审理了这起案件，社交媒体平台 X 同意暂时不使用从欧盟用户那里收集到的个人数据来训练其人工智能系统，因为在此之前，用户可以选择撤销同意。【原文：Social media platform X agreed on Thursday not to train its AI systems for now using the personal data collected from European Union users before they had the option to withdraw their consent, an Irish court heard on Thursday.】

item.title: X 处理英国骚乱的方式可能会影响欧盟调查
item.description: 一位发言人说，欧盟委员会正在对社交媒体平台 X 进行调查，调查可能会考虑到该平台对与最近英国骚乱有关的有害内容的处理方式。【原文：An ongoing European Commission investigation into social media platform X could take its handling of harmful content related to the recent UK riots into account, a spokesperson said.】

item.title: 消息人士称，拉扎德聘请古根海姆银行家海登负责私募股权交易业务
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的人士周四表示，投资银行拉扎德（Lazard）已聘请古根海姆证券公司（Guggenheim Securities）的考特尼-海登（Courtney Haydon）担任董事总经理，帮助推动私募股权公司和另类资产管理公司的交易。【原文：Investment bank Lazard has hired Courtney Haydon from Guggenheim Securities as a managing director to help drive dealmaking involving private equity firms and alternative asset managers, a person familiar with the matter said on Thursday.】

item.title: 中东紧张局势加剧，航空公司暂停航班
item.description: 对中东地区更广泛冲突的担忧促使国际航空公司暂停飞往该地区的航班或避开受影响的空域。【原文：Concerns over a wider conflict in the Middle East have prompted international airlines to suspend flights to the region or to avoid affected air space.】

item.title: OpenAI 对谷歌的威胁大于美国监管机构
item.description: 谷歌正面临着山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）的 OpenAI 带来的更大威胁，即使它正在等待华盛顿的反垄断监管机构就如何在互联网搜索业务中创造公平竞争环境做出决定。【原文：Google is facing a bigger threat from Sam Altman's OpenAI even as it awaits a decision on how antitrust regulators in Washington plan to level the playing field in the internet search business.】

item.title: 边疆公司季度利润超出预期，推迟交付喷气机
item.description: 周四，廉价航空公司边疆航空公司（Frontier Airlines）的母公司边疆集团（Frontier Group）第二季度利润超出华尔街预期，并表示将推迟交付 54 架空中客车喷气式飞机。【原文：Frontier Group , the parent of budget carrier Frontier Airlines, beat Wall Street estimates for second-quarter profit on Thursday, and said it will defer taking deliveries of 54 Airbus jets.】

item.title: 安全委员会希望在 2025 年初完成对波音 MAX 的调查
item.description: 美国国家运输安全委员会主席珍妮弗-霍门迪（Jennifer Homendy）表示，该机构的工作人员希望在明年初完成对1月5日阿拉斯加航空公司波音737 MAX 9空中紧急事件的调查。【原文：National Transportation Safety Board chair Jennifer Homendy said staff at the agency would like to complete its probe into the Jan. 5 Alaska Airlines Boeing 737 MAX 9 mid-air emergency by early next year.】

item.title: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪推出首款配备激光雷达传感器的车型
item.description: 中国电动汽车（EV）巨头比亚迪周四推出了新款 Seal EV，这是该公司首款配备激光雷达传感器的车型。【原文：China's electric vehicle (EV) giant BYD on Thursday launched a new version of its Seal EV, the company's first model equipped with lidar sensors.】

item.title: 莱茵金属预计与莱昂纳多的合资公司将获得高达 250 亿欧元的订单
item.description: 德国莱茵金属防务集团首席执行官周四表示，预计意大利政府将为其与防务制造商莱昂纳多的合资坦克制造企业提供价值高达 250 亿欧元（合 272.7 亿美元）的订单。【原文：Rheinmetall expects orders worth up to 25 billion euros ($27.27 billion) from the Italian government for its joint tank-building venture with defence manufacturer Leonardo , the German defence group's CEO said on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国最近一周每周申请失业救济人数降幅超过预期
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数量降幅超过预期，这表明人们对劳动力市场正在解体的担忧被夸大了，劳动力市场逐步走软的趋势依然未变。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits fell more than expected last week, suggesting fears the labor market is unraveling were overblown and the gradual softening in the labor market remains intact.】

item.title: 司法部长称，土耳其因担心滥用权力而封锁了 Roblox 的访问权限
item.description: 土耳其司法部长表示，由于担心游戏内容可能导致虐待儿童，土耳其已经禁止访问流行的视频游戏平台 Roblox。【原文：Turkey has blocked access to the popular video game platform Roblox over concerns about content that could lead to child abuse, the country's justice minister said.】

item.title: 波音新任首席执行官寻求恢复信任，贴近生产
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份给员工的信息，波音公司的新老板凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）将于周四在西雅图附近会见工厂工人，并承诺将更接近这家美国飞机制造商的生产线，因为他面临着 "恢复信任 "的艰巨任务。【原文：Boeing's new boss Kelly Ortberg will meet factory workers near Seattle on Thursday and pledged to be closer to the U.S. planemaker's production lines, as he faces the steep task of "restoring trust," according to a message to employees seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 司法部长称，土耳其因担心滥用权力而封锁了 Roblox 的访问权限
item.description: 土耳其司法部长表示，由于担心游戏内容可能导致虐待儿童，土耳其已经禁止访问流行的视频游戏平台 Roblox。【原文：Turkey has blocked access to the popular video game platform Roblox over concerns about content that could lead to child abuse, the country's justice minister said.】

item.title: 摩根大通称，Robinhood 进军期货业即使不免费也不会轻松
item.description: 摩根大通（J.P. Morgan）分析师周四表示，Robinhood 今年进军期货交易，如果收取费用，使用其免佣金平台的零售交易商可能会持谨慎态度。【原文：Robinhood's entry into futures trading this year could be met with some caution by retail traders using its commission-free platform if it charges a fee, J.P. Morgan analysts said on Thursday.】

item.title: 由于 COVID 疫苗销售疲软，Novavax 季度收入不及预期
item.description: Novavax 公司周四下调了 2024 年的收入预期，因为该公司预计 COVID-19 疫苗的销售额会下降，包括该公司针对 JN.1 变异株的秋季更新疫苗。【原文：Novavax on Thursday cut its revenue forecast for 2024 as it anticipated lower sales of its COVID-19 vaccine, including the company's updated shot for the fall season targeting the JN.1 variant.】

item.title: 马丁-玛丽埃塔公司因 "蓝水 "交易影响下调财年盈利展望
item.description: 建筑材料供应商马丁-玛丽埃塔公司周四下调了 2024 年全年收入和净利润预期，以计入与收购蓝水工业公司（Blue Water Industries）有关的费用。【原文：Building material supplier Martin Marietta cut its forecast for full-year 2024 revenue and net earnings on Thursday to account for a charge related to its acquisition of Blue Water Industries' units.】

item.title: 投资者预计市场抛售将放缓、延伸和扩散
item.description: 基金经理们表示，本周由日元融资交易平仓引发的全球市场大跌远未结束，最终可能蔓延到信贷市场，损害一些银行，并可能损害美元。【原文：This week's huge selloff in global markets, triggered by an unwinding of yen-funded trades, is far from over and could eventually spread to credit markets, impair some banks and possibly hurt the U.S. dollar, fund managers say.】

item.title: 在扭亏为盈的推动下，Under Armour 因库存减少而实现意外盈利
item.description: Under Armour 周四公布的第一季度利润出人意料，这得益于公司在批发业务面临挑战的情况下努力减少库存，以及北美市场对其运动服装的需求疲软。【原文：Under Armour posted a surprise first-quarter profit on Thursday, benefiting from its efforts to reduce inventory amid a challenging wholesale business and softer demand for its athletic wear in North America.】

item.title: 投资 1.78 亿美元，巴西 SKY 母公司推出针对供应商的金融科技产品
item.description: SKY Brasil 的母公司将在未来两年内投资 10 亿雷亚尔（约合 1.7783 亿美元），在南美国家推出一项金融技术。【原文：SKY Brasil's parent company will launch a fintech in the South American nation initially targeting small businesses that work with the telecommunications firm, with a 1 billion real ($177.83 million) investment over the next two years, the groups said on Thursday.】

item.title: Palantir 将在微软 Azure 上为美国政府机构部署人工智能产品
item.description: Palantir Technologies 周四表示，它将在微软的云平台上提供其产品，包括人工智能平台（AIP），该平台主要面向美国政府和国防部等联邦机构。【原文：Palantir Technologies said on Thursday it will offer its products, including the Artificial Intelligence Platform (AIP) on Microsoft's cloud platforms, which cater to the U.S. government and federal agencies such as the Department of Defense.】

item.title: 软件供应商 EPAM 因人工智能应用强劲而实现季度业绩增长
item.description: 本周四，EPAM Systems 的季度利润和收入均超出预期，这主要得益于企业日益数字化运营对其 IT 服务的强劲需求。【原文：EPAM Systems beat quarterly profit and revenue estimates on Thursday, helped by strong demand for its IT services as businesses are increasingly digitizing their operations.】
